When he is spotted by Peru's most successful surf champion, Sofia Mulanovich, he is given the chance to succeed. However, the pressure to do so weighs heavily on him. Without his father around, the lure of his friends and the risks of life in the barrios threaten to jeopardize everything he has worked for. When he is injured outside a nightclub in a drive by shooting, Ryan is forced to decide once and for all which path to take.
